description: Rate tables derived from actual sub proposals. Tagged by project characteristics for matching.

profiles.source_project: Lazarus Project — 693 E Main St, Waterbury CT

bids.scope: Foundation, slab, wall, sonotube, grade beam. Prevailing wage. Plans dated 8/12/2025 structural.
Form and pour matt slab, 1 side walls, cap, stem walls, retaining walls, sauna tubes, concrete stairs. Prevailing wage included.

concrete_foundation.notes: Rate is per footprint SF. Seven low bid scope: foundation + slab + walls + sonotube + grade beam.

bids.scope: Materials only loose sticks for 1 building, 10,151 SF. Construction Type 5a. Includes: loose wood wall materials, building infill, floor trusses + 2x framing, roof trusses + 2x rafters, exterior/interior wall studs, plates, headers, sheathing (7/16 OSB walls, 5/8 OSB roof, 23/32 T&G OSB floors), pressure treated bottom plates, Simpson hold-down hardware, LVL/PSL in roof, hurricane tie-downs, stair stringers + treads + platforms. EXCLUDES: siding, trim, roofing, windows, doors, all steel/LGM, shear wall (material), insulation, gypsum, FRT materials, labor. ADD OPTIONS: $1,300 commercial Tyvek + tape; $1,210 caulking + Dupont window flashing.

rough_carpentry_materials.notes: Materials only. Labor by framing contractor separately. 84 Lumber proposal based on plans 5/21/2025 + Addenda 1 and 2.

bids.scope: Full framing labor. Highest bid.
Framing labor.
Material + some labor. Low bid.

rough_carpentry_labor.notes: Wide range. SOV allocated $306,757 for rough carpentry total (material + labor). Use $30/SF total (mat + labor) as baseline.

bids.scope: Full HVAC scope — see Eastern proposal for typical scope.

Drawings M001,M002,M100,M101,M102 dated 6/30/25 by Kuegler Associates. Includes: unlined galvanized ductwork (rect + round), black steel gas piping, (3) rooftop units, (2) kitchen exhaust hoods with firestop fire suppressor, (24) fans, (2) fire dampers, (32) fire/smoke dampers, (20) smoke dampers, (24) electric wall heaters, (65) RGDs, (24) toilet wall caps (install by other), (4) zone dampers, standalone RTU controls (life/safety by electrician), duct insulation, rigging, start-up + testing, 12-month warranty, prevailing wages, permits. EXCLUDES: sprinkler work, structural steel, demolition, concrete coring/patching, BIM, bond, fire protection, temp services, excavation/backfilling, haz-mat, gutters/downspouts, painting, data/low-voltage, kitchen equipment (by others), motor starters/VFDs, overhead utility wire, R32/R454b equipment.

hvac.notes: System: 3 RTUs + 24 electric wall heaters + 24 fans + ductwork. Rate per total building SF.

bids.scope: Full electrical scope.

Drawings E001,E002,E100,E101,E102,E600,E601,FA001,FA100 dated 6/20/25. Includes: temp power from existing service, MC/NM cable wiring per NEC, lighting + power per plans, (3) circuits per unit, power to fan/light in bathrooms (unit by others), power to (3) RTUs, (1) 400A meter socket (overhead service), (1) MDP, (1) Panel B, (1) Panel 1, (1) Panel 2, (1) Panel 3, addressable fire alarm system per FA100, free air fire alarm cable, FSD/SD controlled by corridor smoke detectors, furnish (2) duct smoke detectors (install by others), furnish (2) tamper switches (install by others), start-up+testing, 12-month warranty, prevailing wages, permits. Electrical Fixture Breakout: $23,420 included. EXCLUDES: sprinkler, structural steel, bond, BIM, data/low-voltage, AFCI breakers not on drawings, demolition, devices not shown.

electrical.notes: Includes fire alarm. (1) 400A service, 5 panels, 3 circuits/unit. Fixture breakout $23,420.

bids.scope: Full plumbing scope.

Plans dated 6/30/2025. No alternates. Install new DWV piping to all fixture locations. 2-inch K copper from inside building to 5ft outside. New copper cold/hot/recirc throughout. Insulate all water piping. Fixtures: (2) gas water heaters, (24) water closets, (24) lavatories, (22) showers, (2) kitchen sinks, (1) mop sink = 75 fixtures. Copper supply, PVC DWV. EXCLUDES: PRVs, in-wall blocking, concrete demolition/excavation/backfill for underground, toilet accessories/grab bars, gas piping, permit fees, sales tax.

Drawings P001,P100,P101,P600 dated 6/20/25. Schedule 40 PVC DWV (within 5ft of exterior). Uponor PEX domestic water (within 5ft exterior). (2) floor cleanouts, (1) grade cleanout, (22) floor drains, (2) gas water heaters + expansion tanks, (1) recirc pump, (24) lavs, (1) mop sink, (1) mixing valve, (1) PRV, (1) water meter (install only), (22) showers, (2) kitchen sinks, (24) floor-mounted WCs. Insulation for domestic water. Water sanitization. Prevailing wages, permits.

plumbing.notes: 75 total fixtures. Rate per fixture. PEX supply, PVC DWV typical. Includes 2 gas water heaters.

bids.scope: NFPA 13. CPVC pipe for units, black steel for exposed. Semi-recessed sprinklers with white trim. FDC, backflow preventer, fire caulk, permit fees, engineered shop drawings (PE sealed), 200 psi hydrostatic test, Material & Test Certificate. 1-year warranty. Plans dated 6/30/2025. EXCLUDES: underground waterlines, fire extinguishers, painting/patchwork, wiring of devices, pipe insulation/heat trace, pumps, access panels.

fire_sprinkler.notes: NFPA 13 commercial wet pipe. CPVC + black steel. Very tight bid spread = stable market rate.

bids.scope: Firestone or Johns Manville 60mil EPDM fully adhered. 2.5-inch flat polyiso base layer (low-rise foam), 1/4-inch/ft tapered system over base (est 19-inch at high point), 1/2-inch/ft crickets at mechanical curbs. Seams with seam tape, 6-inch flashing tape, RTS strip perimeter. All sheet metal (parapet coping, gutters, downspouts, counterflashings). Walkway pads per plans. Bilco roof hatch + safety rail. 20-year NDL manufacturer warranty. EXCLUDES: RTU curbs (by HVAC), wood blocking (by framer), plumbing through roof (by plumber), waste disposal/permits/site utilities (by GC), AVB/insulated zip (by others). ALTERNATE: Add $9,300 for R-21 + R-49 fiberglass batt in parapet cavities.

roofing_epdm.notes: Rate per footprint SF (roof area). 60mil EPDM fully adhered with tapered insulation. Includes all sheet metal.

bids.scope: CertainTeed Cedar Impressions D7 vinyl siding. All PVC trim boards. Shop-fabricated window trims with integral J-channel. Drip caps + siding metal flashings. AWPs + lift equipment + safety. EXCLUDES: AVB (by framing contractor), EIFS bands (by others), vents through siding (by HVAC).
STO EIFS bands per plans. AWPs + safety.

EIFS with EIFS moldings per plans. Prevailing wage included. EXCLUDES: overtime, night/2nd shift, temp utilities, weather protection, OCIP/CCIP, union labor, flashing, framing, impact mesh, sheathing, blocking, mechanical fasteners, engineering, haz-mat, caulking, shop drawings, demo, testing, security, storage, permits, dumpsters, taxes, bonds, paint, XPS/extruded foam, limestone/special finishes.

eifs_bands.notes: EIFS bands only, not full EIFS cladding.

bids.scope: Plans dated 5/21/2025. SPRAY FOAM: R-45 HFO HL 2LB closed cell 6-inch in 3rd floor ceiling areas, R-21 HFO HL 2LB closed cell 3-inch in exterior rim joists. FIBERGLASS BATTS: R-19 unfaced 24-inch (top layer R-49 at roof curbs), R-30 kraft 24-inch (bottom layer R-49 at roof curbs), R-21 kraft HD 15-inch (parapet walls + exterior walls Type 8), R-38 unfaced 16-inch (1st+2nd floor ceiling sound), R-30 kraft 16-inch (basement ceiling), R-11 unfaced 15.25-inch (2x4 sound walls), R-19 unfaced 15.25-inch (2x6 sound walls). MINERAL WOOL: 6x16 (corridor + separation walls Type 1), 3x16 (stairwell walls Type 2). Touch N Seal can foam around windows/doors. EXCLUDES: rigid foam board, caulking, sealants, draftstop/fire block/fire stop/fire-rated caulking.

insulation.notes: Includes spray foam + batt + mineral wool. Full building insulation scope.

bids.scope: All drywall and finish taping. Drywall ceiling + soffits. Shaft wall. Prevailing wage. Tax exempt. DEDUCT ALTERNATES: acoustic ceiling Armstrong Cortega (-$32,500), install HM frames/doors/accessories (-$15,000). All equipment as necessary.

drywall.notes: Wide range. JP Solutions and Enclave are close. Tri-Star is an outlier at 2x.

bids.scope: Floor tile, bath wall tile, kitchen backsplash tile, VCT flooring, rubber flooring. Material as called out on plans. Material + labor.

Interior tile and flooring per drawings dated 5/21/25. Bathroom floor tile (floors 1-3), bathroom wall tile (floors 1-3), custodian floor + wall, kitchen backsplash, marble saddles 6x36, VCT flooring, vinyl cove base, corridor carpet, corridor wall, 1st floor open area flooring + base, stair treads + risers, stair landing VCT. EXCLUDES: waterproofing, floor prep, Schluter/bullnose. Note: Non-union labor.

flooring.notes: Per total SF. Includes tile, VCT, rubber, carpet, backsplash. Material + labor.

bids.scope: Furnish + install 3/4-inch Maxxon Gyp-Crete 2000 Multifamily (min 2500 psi) reinforced over Maxxon Acousti-Mat 1/4 throughout 1st, 2nd, 3rd floors (1 building). Approx 6,700 SF. 3 mobilizations included. Sealer included (material only, install by others). Prevailing wage rates included. Tax excluded. EXCLUDES: ground floor area, trimming isolation strips, pre-pours of tub/shower areas, structural prep, floor prep for finished goods. OPTIONS: 1-inch pour ADD $3,000; reduce to 1 mob DEDUCT $7,000.

gypcrete.notes: 3/4-inch Maxxon Gyp-Crete over Acousti-Mat. Per total SF.

bids.scope: Prime + 2-coat paint all gypsum ceilings and walls. Prime and paint all interior doors, frames, casings, windowsills. Material + labor.
Interior painting. Prevailing wage.

painting.notes: Prime + 2 coats. Interior only. Wide range — New Hope MBE/WBE is significantly lower.

bids.scope: Material only. 62 hollow metal doors (18GA cold rolled steel, honeycomb core, primed, insulated/rated where specified, galvanized exterior). 62 hollow metal frames (16GA, knockdown, primed, rated where specified, galvanized exterior). Hardware: ALX Series Schlage locksets, Stanley FBB179 hinges, LCN 1460 closers, Rockwood kickplates + door viewers, Pemko weatherstripping + thresholds. Per A-12 door/frame schedule + hardware notes. Sales tax $3,885 included. VALUE ENGINEERING DEDUCT: -$14,460 (substitute Assa Abloy Accentra locksets, Yale exit devices, McKinney hinges, Norton closers). EXCLUDES: marble thresholds (by others), aluminum openings (F13 interpreted as aluminum — by others), aluminum door hardware. NOTES: No HM or hardware specs were provided — bid based on door schedule.

doors_hardware_material.notes: Material only including tax. $1,050/opening. Labor quoted separately by New Hope.

bids.scope: Install all metal doors and hardware. Labor only.
Door casings and windowsills. Base trim throughout. Material + labor. Quote for level 1 materials not noted on plans.

finish_carpentry.notes: Includes door casings, windowsills, base trim. Material + labor.

bids.scope: Supply only: Jeld-Wen Premium Vinyl, 47 openings. Quantities: W1:4, W2:8, W3:27, W3-Tempered:1, W4:3, W4-Tempered:4. Specs: 3-1/4 factory jambs, SunFlow+HeatSave+Argon glass (U:0.26, SHGC:0.43), 1-inch contour GBG, white sash cam locks, factory vinyl flat casing, full fiberglass screen. W3+W4 quoted as single hung for ADA sash locks per A-13. Sales tax included. ALTERNATE: Add $470 for WOCD (Window Opening Control Device). EXCLUDES: interior casings, jamb extensions, storefront/HM doors, field water testing, installation fasteners/shims. 30% deposit at order, 90-day pricing, no retainage.

windows_material.notes: Material/supply only. 47 vinyl window openings. Excludes storefront.

bids.scope: Storefront allowance.

storefront.notes: Single allowance for commercial storefront. Get specific quote.

bids.scope: Cabinet installation labor in bathrooms and kitchenettes. Required wall blocking by others. Electrical/plumbing connections by others. Quote for level 1 materials not noted on plans.
Cabinets material.

cabinets_install.notes: Install labor only for cabinet installation. Material separate.

bids.scope: Install grab bars, towel holders, robe holder, toilet paper holder, shower rods. Material as called out on plans. Material + labor.
Demolition $35K + Sitework $202K + Landscaping $28K. Urban infill 0.12 acres.

sitework.notes: SOV $264,900 / 7,121 SF = $37/SF. Urban infill, tight site.

gc_markups.notes: Commercial projects: subs include their O&P. GC margin lower than residential. Reference buyout had ~15.7% profit margin on $3.5M contract.

residential_default.description: Default rates for single-family residential. Used when no profile matches.
residential_default.notes: These are the existing rates already in engine.py. Do not change these.
